Module Jtrash
Package model

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
model.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer
public class GameController extends Object implements Observer
Controller which handles the game class and view, as per the MVC pattern

    • update

      public void update(int i)
      the update method related to the Observer pattern. It has a wide array of function paired to an integer number. (0) calls the method to update the view for the cpus (1) handles the end of a round, making the hand appear smaller (3) uses the winner function to display the correct message on the final frame (4) uses the loser function to display the correct message on the final frame (5) tells the user if it's the last round of a manche (Someone has done a trash)
      Specified by:
      update in interface Observer
      Parameters:
      i - , input to differentiate different cases

    • winner

      public void winner()
      puts on the final frame a victory message

      puts on the final frame a loss message
